languages.text: "Размести заказ покрупнее, вышли аванс и назначь встречу. Возьмем на горячем".
"Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."
languages.original_text: "Размести заказ покрупнее, вышли аванс и назначь встречу. Возьмем на горячем".

traits.locale_text: "Place a sizeable order, send a downpayment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him red-handed."
"Place a sizeable order, send a downpayment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him red-handed."
"Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him red-handed."
"Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him red-handed."
"Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."
"Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."

languages.text: "Macht eine relevante Bestellung, schickt eine Vorauszahlung und organisiert ein Treffen. Dann schnappen wir ihn auf frischer Tat."
languages.original_text: "Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."

traits.locale_text: "Macht eine relevante Bestellung, schickt eine Vorauszahlung und organisiert ein Treffen. Dann schnappen wir ihn auf frischer Tat."

languages.text: « Passez une commande importante, envoyez un acompte et organisez un rendez-vous. Nous le prendrons sur le fait. »
languages.original_text: "Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."

traits.locale_text: « Passez une commande importante, envoyez un acompte et organisez un rendez-vous. Nous le prendrons sur le fait. »

languages.text: “下个大单，把预付款付掉，再安排一场会面。我们这次要抓个现行。”
languages.original_text: "Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."

traits.locale_text: “下个大单，把预付款付掉，再安排一场会面。我们这次要抓个现行。”
“下个大单，把预付款付掉，再安排一场会面。我们这次要人赃俱获。”

languages.text: «Solo tenemos que hacer un pedido considerable, enviar el pago y establecer el punto de encuentro. Podemos atraparle en el acto».
languages.original_text: "Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."

traits.locale_text: «Solo tenemos que hacer un pedido considerable, enviar el pago y establecer el punto de encuentro. Podemos atraparle en el acto».

languages.text: 「まとまった量の注文を出して、前金を払い、会合を設定しろ。取引の最中に奴を押さえる」
languages.original_text: "Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."

traits.locale_text: 「まとまった量の注文を出して、前金を払い、会合を設定しろ。取引の最中に奴を押さえる」

languages.text: "Yüklü bir sipariş ver, kaporayı gönder, görüşme ayarla. Suçüstü yakalayacağız."
languages.original_text: "Place a sizeable order, send a down payment, and set up a meeting. We'll catch him in the act."

traits.locale_text: "Yüklü bir sipariş ver, kaporayı gönder, görüşme ayarla. Suçüstü yakalayacağız."
